items.name: Double Delight
items.description:
Grab your favourite Subway Melt and Beef Meatball Marinara subs at a special deal, for a limited time only!
Served with 5pcs toasty Black Pepper Chicken Nuggets, freshly baked Waffle Cut fries and two 16oz drinks to double the delight.

items.name: Chicken Trio
items.description:
Save more with your favourite Chicken Trio  – Chicken Cutlet, Chicken Teriyaki, Bulgogi Chicken for a limited time only!
Served with 5pcs toasty Black Pepper Chicken Nuggets, freshly baked Waffle Cut fries, a cookie and three 16oz drinks to triple the delight.

items.name: Family Favourites
items.description: Delight the family with favourite flavours from Subway! Comes with Egg Mayo, Tuna Mayo, Chicken Cutlet and Subway Melt,  and served with 10pcs  toasty Black Pepper Chicken Nuggets, freshly baked Waffle Cut fries, a cookie and four 16oz drinks.
